Title: The Lodger: A Story of the London Fog
FullTitle: The Lodger: A Story of the London Fog (1927)
Plot: A serial killer known as "The Avenger" is on the loose in London, murdering blonde women. A mysterious man arrives at the house of Mr. and Mrs. Bunting looking for a room to rent. The Bunting's daughter is a blonde model and is seeing one of the detectives assigned to the case. The detective becomes jealous of the lodger and begins to suspect he may be the avenger.
Writers: Marie Belloc Lowndes, Eliot Stannard, Alfred Hitchcock
Stars: June Tripp, Ivor Novello, Marie Ault, Arthur Chesney

Similars.Title: Blackmail
Similars.Plot: After killing a man in self-defense, a young woman is blackmailed by a witness to the killing.
Similars.Stars: Anny Ondra, John Longden, Sara Allgood

Similars.Title: The Ring
Similars.Plot: Two boxers compete for the love of a woman.
Similars.Stars: Carl Brisson, Lillian Hall-Davis, Ian Hunter

Similars.Title: When Boys Leave Home
Similars.Plot: Public schoolboy Roddy Berwick is expelled from school when he takes the blame for a friend's charge and his life falls apart in a series of misadventures.
Similars.Stars: Ivor Novello, Ben Webster, Norman McKinnel

Similars.Title: Sabotage
Similars.Plot: A Scotland Yard undercover detective is on the trail of a saboteur who is part of a plot to set off a bomb in London. But when the detective's cover is blown, the plot begins to unravel.
Similars.Stars: Sylvia Sidney, Oskar Homolka, Desmond Tester

Similars.Title: The Pleasure Garden
Similars.Plot: Two couples' romances are fancifully intertwined.
Similars.Stars: Virginia Valli, Carmelita Geraghty, Miles Mander

Similars.Title: Easy Virtue
Similars.Plot: A recently divorced woman hides her scandalous past from her new husband and his family.
Similars.Stars: Isabel Jeans, Franklin Dyall, Eric Bransby Williams

Similars.Title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
Similars.FullTitle: The Man Who Knew Too Much (1934)
Similars.Plot: An ordinary British couple vacationing in Switzerland suddenly find themselves embroiled in a case of international intrigue when their daughter is kidnapped by spies plotting a political assassination.
Similars.Stars: Leslie Banks, Edna Best, Peter Lorre

Similars.Title: The Manxman
Similars.Plot: A fisherman and a rising young lawyer, who grew up as brothers, fall in love with the same girl.
Similars.Stars: Anny Ondra, Carl Brisson, Malcolm Keen

Similars.Title: Young and Innocent
Similars.Plot: A man on the run from a murder charge enlists a beautiful stranger who must put herself at risk for his cause.
Similars.Stars: Nova Pilbeam, Derrick De Marney, Percy Marmont

Similars.Title: Murder!
Similars.Plot: A juror in a murder trial, after voting to convict, has second thoughts and begins to investigate on his own before the execution.
Similars.Stars: Herbert Marshall, Norah Baring, Phyllis Konstam

Similars.Title: Secret Agent
Similars.Plot: After three British Agents are assigned to assassinate a mysterious German spy during World War I, two of them become ambivalent when their duty to the mission conflicts with their consciences.
Similars.Stars: John Gielgud, Madeleine Carroll, Robert Young

Similars.Title: The Farmer's Wife
Similars.Plot: After his daughter weds, a middle-aged widower with a profitable farm decides to remarry, but finds choosing a suitable mate a problematic process.
Similars.Stars: Jameson Thomas, Lillian Hall-Davis, Gordon Harker
